title: Duties and Offerings for Priests and Levites
summary: Numbers 18 gives instructions about the responsibilities of priests and Levites. Priests were to handle sacred duties, while Levites assisted them. Offerings and portions were assigned to support them since they had no land inheritance.

faq.question: How were the priests and Levites supported?
faq.answer: Through tithes and offerings given by the people.

faq.question: What was the role of the Levites?
faq.answer: To assist the priests and care for the tabernacle, but not perform the altar duties.
